smg.text: Cold and very dry. Fine. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Dry. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 4 to 5 easterly winds with gusts, becoming force 2 to 3 northeasterly winds.
Dry. Mainly fine. Force 2 to 3 north to northeasterly winds.
Mainly fine. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
Mainly fine. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
